text: William Brantley Aycock (October 24, 1915 - June 20, 2015) was an American educator. He served as chancellor of the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill from 1957 until 1964 and is the retired Kenan Professor of Law at the UNC School of Law. He was born in Lucama, North Carolina in 1915. ==References== Category:1915 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Academics from North Carolina
title: William Brantley Aycock
